title: The Untold Truth Of American Horror Story
author: Looper
comment: What's your favorite season of "American Horror Story"?
The season at the hotel, Evan Peters did a phenomenal job. Not saying he didn't do great the other seasons but that season..yasss!
Freakshow (which I feel gets no love), Murder House, Coven, and Aocolypse are my other most favorite seasons of the series.
I love AHS I don't ever want it to end. I hope season 10 is not the last. If i had to pick a favorite as of now I would say "asylum".
Unpopular opinion, but 1984 was my favourite season. I loved the campy references to 80s horror and I’m so happy Cody Fern returned to play another great role. Also love Coven, Asylum and Freakshow
description: Since 2011, "American Horror Story" has been bringing Ryan Murphy's perspective on the horror anthology genre to our streaming devices, and it's picked up legions of devoted fans. Demonstrating the power of keeping a single cast, but changing the story and characters each season, "AHS" has managed to explore a wide range of themes and tropes, while still keeping the show fresh. With so many successes, cast and crew members, episodes, and spin-offs now to consider, there's a lot that even the freakiest of fans probably doesn't know. So let us catch you up. Here's the untold truth of "American Horror Story".
